name: stone
title: Stone
desc: Free Astro theme specially designed for Business, Marketing, SaaS and Startup websites.
article:
Key Features:

  • Built with Tailwind CSS & Alpine.js
  • 5+ Pages
  • 15+ Sections
  • Clean & Modern Design
  • Fully Responsive
  • Dark & Light Mode
  • Fast & Performant
  • Super Lightweight
  • View Transitions (experimental)
  • Prettier Code Formatter
  • Google Fonts
  • Remix Icons
  • Free Updates

github.name: astro-theme-stone
github.description: Stone is a free and open-source Astro theme specially designed for Business, Marketing, SaaS and Startup websites.
